1. When you add onto this story, please write chapters longer than a measly few sentences. You don't have to write Shakespeare, but at least put some effort into progressing the story.
2. Try to keep it realistic. If they're going to gain massive amounts of weight, have a time skip. There are other stories on this site for obnoxious, instant gains of a thousand pounds. Let's try to keep this somewhat rooted in reality. On that note, if magic is involved, and there's no way you can avoid using it, try to keep it at a minimum.
3. Guys can gain if you really want, I don't really care, but let's keep the focus on the women.
4. No one younger than fourteen...that's just wrong...unless you are under fourteen, in which case, I apologize.
5. Lesbians and gay people are perfectly fine, but try to keep the fetishy focus on the gain.

I believe that should be all the issues. Thank you very much, and enjoy!
